EMAIL_FORM_CBB:
• Ensure e-mails are correct and separated by spaces.

    You've missed a field.

    To:

  • The following will be added to your email...

  • Become a Cardmember and get $50 Cashback Bonus with your first purchase within 3 months, and earn rewards on every purchase after that. You'll also get amazing customer service and online tools that will make you a fan of Discover, too.
EMAIL_FORM_MI2:
• Ensure e-mails are correct and separated by spaces.

    You've missed a field.

    To:

  • The following will be added to your email...

  • Become a Cardmember and get 5,000 Miles with your first purchase within 3 months, and earn rewards on every purchase after that. You'll also get amazing customer service and online tools that will make you a fan of Discover, too.
PREV_EMAIL_FORM_CBB:
• To: !~previewEmailTo~!

    From:!~previewEmailFrom~!

    Subject: $50 Cashback Bonus from Discover for both of us.

  • Become a Cardmember and get $50 Cashback Bonus with your first purchase within 3 months, and earn rewards on every purchase after that. You'll also get amazing customer service and online tools that will make you a fan of Discover, too.
PREV_EMAIL_FORM_MI2:
• To: !~previewEmailTo~!

    From:!~previewEmailFrom~!

    Subject: 5,000 Miles from Discover for both of us.

  • Become a Cardmember and get 5,000 Miles with your first purchase within 3 months, and earn rewards on every purchase after that. You'll also get amazing customer service and online tools that will make you a fan of Discover, too.
EMAIL_FRIENDS_PARM_CBB: You've just referred !~emailFriendsParm~! to Discover. We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned $50 Cashback Bonus!
EMAIL_FRIENDS_PARM_MI2: You've just referred !~emailFriendsParm~! to Discover. We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned 5,000 Miles!
FACEBOOK_CONFRM_CBB: You've just shared Discover on Facebook! We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned $50 Cashback Bonus!
FACEBOOK_CONFRM_MI2: You've just shared Discover on Facebook! We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned 5,000 Miles!
TWITTER_CONFRM_CBB: You've just tweeted about Discover. We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned $50 Cashback Bonus!
TWITTER_CONFRM_MI2: You've just tweeted about Discover. We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned 5,000 Miles!
LINKDIN_CONFRM_CBB: You've just shared Discover on LinkedIn. We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned $50 Cashback Bonus!
LINKDIN_CONFRM_MI2: You've just shared Discover on LinkedIn. We'll let you know by email each time a friend you've referred becomes a Cardmember, and you've earned 5,000 Miles!
REFER_WHAT_FAQ_CBB: It's an easy way to get $50 Cashback Bonus! For each friend you refer who is approved for the Discover card after applying through the unique link by the reply date, you'll receive a $50 Cashback Bonus. Once your friend makes their first purchase within the first three months, they will also get a $50 Cashback Bonus.
REFER_WHAT_FAQ_MI2: It's an easy way to get 5,000 reward miles! For each friend you refer who is approved for the Discover card after applying through the unique link by the reply date, you'll receive a 5,000 miles. Once your friend makes their first purchase within the first three months, they will also get a 5,000 miles.
REFER_INCLUDE_FAQ_CBB: You know your friends best. Tell them about all the great ways you use your Discover card and Cashback Bonus that you think they'd also enjoy by adding a personal message to your referral.
REFER_INCLUDE_FAQ_MI2: You know your friends best. Tell them about all the great ways you use your Discover card and the extra miles that you think they'd also enjoy by adding a personal message to your referral.
REFER_TIME_HEADER_FAQ_CBB: I've already referred a friend, when will I receive my Cashback Bonus?
REFER_TIME_HEADER_FAQ_MI2: I've already referred a friend, when will I receive my extra miles?
REFER_TIME_FAQ_CBB: It may take up to 5 weeks for your $50 Cashback Bonus to post to your account after each referral is approved.
REFER_TIME_FAQ_MI2: It may take up to 5 weeks for your 5,000 miles to post to your account after each referral is approved.
REFER_MAX_EARN_FAQ_CBB: You could earn up to $5,000 Cashback Bonus per year.
REFER_MAX_EARN_FAQ_MI2: You could earn up to 500,000 miles per year.
REFER_CONFRM_HEADER_FAQ_CBB: Where can I check if I've received $50 Cashback Bonus?
REFER_CONFRM_HEADER_FAQ_MI2: Where can I check if I've received my miles?
